title: Computationally-accelerated prediction of polyester-melamine coatings degradation to design sustainable organically-coated steels for outdoor applications
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,18343-18354
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA06744K, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Chris Batchelor, Francisco J. Martin-Martinez, Chris Griffiths, Ian Mabbett, James Smith, Eifion Jewell
The study combines computational chemical modelling and practical weathering investigations, finding that computational analysis matches real-world weathering degradation across all investigated areas in a much shorter time than weathering tests.
